mapper.select: select nvl(count(*),0) from gym where ${searchKey} like '%' || #{searchValue} || '%'

select * from ( select rownum rnum, data.* from ( select distinct gymName from gym where (gymName like '%' || #{searchValue} || '%')) data)
where rnum>=#{start} and rnum<=#{end}

select * from( select rownum rnum, gymAddr from ( select distinct RTRIM(substr( gymAddr,7,instr(gymAddr,'구 ')-5)) gymAddr from gym) where (gymAddr like #{searchValue} || '%구%' or gymAddr like #{searchValue}))
where rnum>=#{start} and rnum<=#{end}

select * from ( select rownum rnum, data.* from ( select distinct gymType from gym where (gymType like '%' || #{searchValue} || '%')) data)
where rnum>=#{start} and rnum<=#{end}
select RTRIM(substr( cusAddr,7,instr(cusAddr,'구 ')-5)) cusAddr from( select cusId,cusAddr from customer where cusId = #{sessionId})
